snippet.title: Blazing Chrome - Environments Trailer
snippet.description:
Blazing Chrome will take the fight for humanity to the Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and PC when it launches in early 2019.

New video explores diverse stage designs fueling classically inspired run-and-gunner!

Blazing Chrome is a throwback to the golden days of side-scrolling shooters with modern touches ensuring its gameplay feels as precise as it does authentic to the era it channels. Players can tear through six highly-varied stages filled with deadly, bullet-spewing AI as Mavra, a lone human resistance fighter, or the rebellious robotic insurgent Doyle.

Make sure to add Blazing Chrome to your wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/609110/Blazing_Chrome/

Developed by JoyMasher
Published by The Arcade Crew

Music by:
Dominic Ninmark
Tiago Santos

© The Arcade Crew - Joymasher - 2018, all rights reserved.
